author: MSNBC.com
title: Chris Hayes: If the GOP loves our country, it needs to fight Covid-19
description: “If we had a government that cared for its people, it would be fighting for us right now,” says Chris Hayes on the Trump admin. and the GOP surrendering as the coronavirus overwhelms the U.S. “If they love this country, they should start acting like it.”

title: How to have a safe Thanksgiving in the time of Covid-19
description: Chris Hayes, Dr. Dara Kass, and Dr. Syra Madad discuss how to safely celebrate Thanksgiving amid the raging pandemic—and that may require rethinking your plans or starting your quarantine now.

title: How presidents (usually) pass the torch to the next in line

title: Trump's emotional state is 'quite fragile' after election loss

title: Trump still won't concede as U.S. hits new Covid-19 record

title: Evangelical Trump supporter says Biden has won election

title: More than 148K new virus cases reported Wednesday

title: Schumer criticizes Republicans for 'deliberately casting doubt on our elections'
description: Sen. Chuck Schumer, D-N.Y., criticized congressional Republicans over their response to the outcome of the 2020 presidential election. He claimed they were "deliberately casting doubt on our elections for no other reason but fear of Donald Trump."

title: Georgia Republicans hope nationalizing state's Senate races will keep them in control
